31445279161952114063.Text: I will return it to her husband as soon as possible.

25484240821277718665.Text: It is nothing but a common amulet, worth little. But it bears an inscription that shows it belongs to Julielle Aumine. She says that the smugglers burned her body and scattered the ashes. Perhaps that is why her spirit is so restless, and why her amulet is so important to her.
